title: Select three policies that together decrease AD

content.question: Which of the following monetary and fiscal policy combinations would most likely result in a decrease in aggregate demand?

choices.label: Central Bank’s Administered Interest Rates Income Tax Rates Government Spending Lower Lower Increase
Central Bank’s Administered Interest Rates Income Tax Rates Government Spending Lower Lower Decrease
Central Bank’s Administered Interest Rates Income Tax Rates Government Spending Raise Raise Increase
Central Bank’s Administered Interest Rates Income Tax Rates Government Spending Raise Lower Increase
Central Bank’s Administered Interest Rates Income Tax Rates Government Spending Raise Raise Decrease

content.answer: Central Bank’s Administered Interest Rates Income Tax Rates Government Spending Raise Raise Decrease

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs when there are multiple contributing variables, or what multiple actions should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
